thread.title: Kenai Fjords Tours Receives Two Industry Awards From the Anchorage Bed & Breakfast Association
thread.title_full: Kenai Fjords Tours Receives Two Industry Awards From the Anchorage Bed & Breakfast Association

author: CIRI Alaska Tourism Corporation (info@www.akbizmag.com)
title: Kenai Fjords Tours Receives Two Industry Awards From the Anchorage Bed & Breakfast Association
text:
Kenai Fjords Tours Receives Two Industry Awards From the Anchorage Bed & Breakfast Association Awards for Best Tour Experience and Innovative Approach to Making Guests Feel Special in 2015 CIRI Alaska Tourism Corporation Published: October 6, 2015 
Kenai Fjords Tours has been recognized by the Anchorage Alaska Bed & Breakfast Association (AABBA) with their awards for Best Tour Experience and Innovative Approach to Making Guests Feel Special in 2015. 
Every year, the AABBA acknowledges businesses with notable service provisions and customer service in the tourism industry. Awards are given based on organization members’ comments. 
“We saw 4 or 5 whales breech. I took my employee as my guest and she was thrilled with the trip. I was happy to be able to offer that to her. I was an enthusiastic promote of that trip all summer long when my guests asked me what would be the best and coolest thing to do while in town. The boat was nice and comfortable and included and all-you-can-eat buffet. It was a great kick-off to a wonderful summer,” said one organization member. 
Kenai Fjords Tours is proud of this accomplishment and strives to exceed expectations of all guests. 

Alaska Native owned and operated, CIRI Alaska Tourism Corporation (CATC) is the umbrella company for Alaska Heritage Tours, Kenai Fjords Tours, Kenai Fjords Wilderness Lodge, Seward Windsong Lodge, and Talkeetna Alaskan Lodge.
